message: Project Mgmt will soon be http://readytakeoff.com :)
It really, really depends on your needs
i have used basecamp and highrise from 37 signals
You also may find some apps with this group http://www.inc.com/howard-greenstein/cloud-based-software-for-small-biz-easy-and-integrated.html

I just started using Podio - I am not a basecamp fan because every time I've used Basecamp people have "gone around it" with Google Docs, Box.net or Dropbox. It happens every time, so I suspect they are missing something - though I just saw they added file sharing of 10MB of files.
We use Socialcast for group communications. Similar to Yammer but found SC had superior mobile and desktop clients that thread replied.

Using Basecamp Suite for work project management. We also use Google Apps as a complimentary tool. Looked at Podio and couldn't get past the confusing interface. Don't underestimate how difficult it will be to get a group to actively use a tool. If the tool is complex or confusing nobody will use it.
